thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 34 of 605
thread.title: Kiernen Spoonster

author: Kiernen Spoonster
title: Kiernen Spoonster
text: The website is slow and jumpy. It is difficult to see items and it becomes very frustrating when your trying to view the items. Your redeem points don't get applied and once I use my credits I am not using fabletics anymore. The clothes are of an okay quality, you have to become a VIP if you want to get your money's worth. Make sure you skip your month if you don't want to be charged. This is how you get roped into spending money.
